summary: This document contains an investor application form for the Atlas Enhanced Fund, LP, detailing the requirements for prospective investors, including accredited investor status and qualified purchaser representation. It includes instructions for completing the application, various certifications, and acknowledgments required from the investor.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Ghislaine Maxwell is listed as the account title holder for the Atlas Enhanced Fund, LP.

keyFacts: The document is an investor application form for the Atlas Enhanced Fund, LP.
Ghislaine Maxwell is identified as the account title holder.
The application requires investors to certify their status as accredited investors and qualified purchasers.
The document outlines the necessary steps for completing the investor application and the implications of the investment.
There are references to compliance with FATCA regulations and the requirement for W-9 forms.
